author: Staff Reporter
text:
Police take out a motorbike rally to spread awareness on the importance of wearing helmets..— Photo: C. Venkatachalapathy

As part of the Road Safety Awareness week, police men took out a motorbike rally on Thursday to spread awareness about the importance of wearing helmets while riding two-wheelers.

The rally that commenced near the Old Bus Stand went on Anna Salai ended at the same location. Nearly 80 police and traffic personnel took part in the rally that was flagged off by the Deputy Superintendent of Police, Vellore sub-division.
title: Helmet awareness rally
